message.content:
Looking at this income statement, I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

The systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is the accounting definition of depreciation. In the income statement, this would be represented by the "Depreciation" line item.

From the provided income statement, I can see:
- Account: Depreciation
- Amount: 45748.43
- Date: 2024-01-27

Therefore, the value of accumulated depreciation is 45748.43.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45748.43'} }
```
